h2_title: Cyan Loong Boss Fight and Guide
content: The good news is that his blade won't stay enchanted forever, often ending with the previously mentioned attack. Once you no longer see electricity crackling along his blade, that's your cue to go back to pressing the attack by getting in staggering blows.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Cyan_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Cyan Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Cyan Loong Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
The good news is that his blade won't stay enchanted forever, often ending with the previously mentioned attack. Once you no longer see electricity crackling along his blade, that's your cue to go back to pressing the attack by getting in staggering blows.
